author: cms-btv-pog
body:
This PR implements the following:
- enabled combinedMVABJetTags and removed combinedSecondaryVertexMVABJetTags from the standard RECO sequence
-  combinedSecondaryVertexMVABJetTags removed from the standard DQM and validation configuration
- bugfix in pfTagInfos (ak4PFJets --> ak4PFJetsCHS)
- updated PAT/miniAOD configs to be more in sync with the standard RECO sequence (additional taggers to be added once this PR is merged and new RelVals appear with these taggers included)
title: Added combinedMVABJetTags and removed  combinedSecondaryVertexMVABJetTags from reco sequence, added bugfix for pfTagInfos, updated PAT/miniAOD configs
